item.title: [PI] Dungeoneering Staffs require runes?
item.dc:creator: @Dragonxile Dragonxile
item.description:
@Dragonxile wrote:

Hey guys, someone suggested on my forums that I should make the dungeoneering staff not require runes, Like the normal staffs… Now I found this lot of code in CombatAssistant.java

public boolean wearingStaff(int runeId) { int wep = c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]; int book = c.playerEquipment[c.playerShield]; switch (runeId) { case 554: //if (wep == 1387) return true; break; case 555: if (wep == 1383 || book == 18346) return true; break; case 556: if (wep == 1381) return true; break; case 557: if (wep == 1385) return true; break; } return false; }

Under the cases I tried adding a new
If (wep == ITEMID)

compiled logged in, equiped the staff but still nothing had happend… If someone can help me that would be great

Thanks in advance

Read full topic
